summary: Chat application with a message input area, character count indicator, action buttons (Reply, React, Share), and share link functionality via message IDs.
architectural_notes: Message IDs must remain in the DOM (even if visually hidden) to support share link functionality

existing_features.title: Vertically align all elements within the chat message input area (text input, buttons, character count indicator) so they are centered on the same vertical axis.
Reduce the vertical padding inside the chat message input area to make it more compact without removing any existing controls.
Hide message ID text visually within message bubbles by making it invisible (e.g., via CSS), while keeping the element in the DOM so that share link functionality continues to work.
